DiceSize6Hint: Mechanics mostly remain with this selection, just remember that hit locations (if used) and probabilites change drastically.
DiceSize10Hint: This is the default die size used in ORE.

MaxDicePoolSizeHint: This caps the amount of dice that can be rolled in a dice pool, unless overridden in the dice pool.
